articles.content: BENGALURU, NEW DELHI : Extreme caution among clients in the global market has sparked a slowdown across verticals in the IT industry, Debashis Chatterjee, managing director and chief executive office… [+5820 chars]

articles.author: Petlee Peter
articles.title: No medical help, hurt during landing, says techie who was trapped in Mumbai-Bengaluru Spicejet flight loo - Times of India
articles.description: A 37-year-old software professional shares his traumatic experience of being stuck inside the toilet of a SpiceJet flight without any medical assistance. Read more about the incident and the passenger's plans to take legal action against the airline.
